name: unreached
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unreached person or place has not been communicated with or visited by someone: A lot of the survivors are still unreached, and this is a problem for foreign aid workers.
More examplesFewer examplesThe tomb remained undiscovered, or at least unreached, until 1818. The scheme has provided a livelihood on a sustainable basis to millions of unreached and underserved rural poor ignored by the banking system.He's targeting the unreached audience, those people who we know would love this music if only we could get to them.
